## JsonRpcProvider.syncUnmarkBad() method

unmarks a block as bad, making it possible to be validated and synced again.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
syncUnmarkBad(blockCid: Cid): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  blockCid | Cid |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
